content: this pattern is customizable it s a tie knot headband it s light weight perfect for summer there is many styles to use this headband it also comes with pre made sizes s m l you can use any #3 weight yarn and only needs 1 skein to make any size you are welcome to use other weight yarn/fibre but might need to adjust hook size it has a chart/diagram to help guide through it thank you to all my testers couldn t get the pattern out without them all mandela van veldhoven aisha gehad angela rezab pavithra emily dharani nissan farha sue king kelly hathaway angie emily chambers emily grindstaff karen valentina ari shouting izell jooste gabi wells hannah aspen instagram @jeijeicro copyright 2023
